name: ImageAnnotatorClient
title: Google
Cloud
Vision
V1
ImageAnnotatorClient
description: Service that performs Google Cloud Vision API detection tasks over client images, such as face, landmark, logo, label, and text detection. The ImageAnnotator service returns detected entities from the images.

params.name: service_path
params.description: The domain name of the API remote host.

params.name: port
params.description: The port on which to connect to the remote host.

params.name: channel
params.description: A Channel object through which to make calls.

params.name: chan_creds
params.description: A ChannelCredentials for the setting up the RPC client.

params.name: client_config
params.description:
A Hash for call options for each method. See
Google::Gax#construct_settings for the structure of
this data. Falls back to the default config if not specified
or the specified config is missing data points.

params.name: timeout
params.description: The default timeout, in seconds, for calls made through this client.

methods.name: batch_annotate_images
title: Google
Cloud
Vision
V1
ImageAnnotatorClient#batch_annotate_images
methods.description: Run image detection and annotation for a batch of images.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/vision/v1/image_annotator_client"

ImageAnnotatorClient = Google::Cloud::Vision::V1::ImageAnnotatorClient

image_annotator_client = ImageAnnotatorClient.new
requests = []
response = image_annotator_client.batch_annotate_images(requests)

params.name: requests
params.description: Individual image annotation requests for this batch.

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.
